overview:
Sorin co-founded Bitground Software, a small startup specialized in providing consulting and outsourcing services, as well as custom software solutions.

He is developing and supporting zkBox (a host-proof online storage solution), Walnote (secure notes online) and Teamness (an interactive web application designed to help the teams to organize their projects and to collaborate with colleagues and customers.).

Sorin has been playing with computers since he was a little kid. Starting with the new millennium, he focused more on the web side of life. He finds the web fascinating because of its power, huge knowledge collection and various interacting modes.

image.attribution: Sorin Ostafiev / Bitground Software
